Nancy's Personal Website

Hello!

I'm Nancy and I love playing with data. I'd love to share some of my enthusiasm with you!

I am currently an MBA candidate at MIT Sloan. Prior, I spent five years in data analytics on various supply chain teams at Amazon. I have a bachelor's in Economics from Yale.

In my free time, I enjoy painting, printmaking, powerlifting, and playing video games.
